about_the_game: Listen to Saturnalia's soundscapes, including the extended main theme, “Passacaglia dei Saturnalia”. Discover more than a hundred artworks including some exclusive cut material.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features scenes of implied physical violence, domestic abuse, and limited gory imagery (screams, human and animal corpses, blood trails). Throughout the game, character dialogue and clues make references to suicide, substance abuse, sexual violence, racism, homophobia, sexism, and abortion that some may find distressing or disturbing. Player discretion is advised.

detailed_description: Listen to Saturnalia's soundscapes, including the extended main theme, “Passacaglia dei Saturnalia”. Discover more than a hundred artworks including some exclusive cut material.
name: Saturnalia Soundtrack and Artbook
short_description: Listen to Saturnalia's soundscapes, including the extended main theme, “Passacaglia dei Saturnalia”. Discover more than a hundred artworks including some exclusive cut material.
